answerText: whiskey priest[10] The whiskey priest is the main character of this British author's novel The Power and the Glory.
heading: NASAT |2013 | 13 | 13 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: After enjoying a few days of safety in the house of Mr. Lehr, this character crosses the border again to hear a dying man's confession. For 10 points each: [10] Name this character who evades the Lieutenant in his attempt to leave his home state, where his religion has been outlawed. On his way, he meets the initially untrustworthy mestizo.
